This field carries the option to be used for a given line. The options are as follows:a.\tUse Header: Use the same shipment address that is assigned on the order header (might be a customer address, might be an override).b.\tUse Customer Address: Use an existing customer address. The address to be used is referenced on the SOLINE_SHIPTOADDR field.c.\tSame as Another Line: Go to the order line referenced on the SOLINE_SHIPTOALTLINE field and use the address it references (could be the Header Address, a Customer Address or an override on that line).d.\tLine Override: Specify the ship-to address directly on this order line. The address information is stored on the SOADDR table.
